body: I'd kinda like a sequel where they get together as a couple officially

I'd never read a doujinshi using GangBang for its main theme is way too wholesome and gib me vanilla feels like this. I luv how the story development. Some peeps might be freak out and say "die cunt, die whore, die skunk!" for reading this one. This one is a good example for "don't judge just from the cover". This story just simply wholesome. xD
we need more doujins with these kind of settings! I, your Grandfather shall second this!
die all cucks and whores burnnnn

And that Kids, was how i met your mother.

kids:.... *o*
Both of you, I love you, thank you for sharing your thoughts as simple as they are about the work.

I don't think it's sad because there isn't any love (or it's something really creepy)=> she's fucking everyone while he's here.(or it's Meta-ntr from both side , that's going pretty far for a moronic story like this.. >.>)

This is really sad, it's like they're waving goodbye at the image of love that they'll never reach... Never expected that I would see this concept in a H-doujinshi... If you ask me, upon this realization, I would just live in denial, looking only for the right one, even if I were to die alone, it's easier to take. Things like these rip my heart apart, I wish I weren't such an emotional fagget.
